channel.title: Posts on Vidify
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Vidify

item.title: Website Launch
item.description: Website launch I’m officially releasing Vidify’s website! This site is intended for non-developers, I’ll migrate part of the GitHub documentation here on how to use Vidify. The wiki is also better managed in here because multiple languages can be used easily, and people can still contribute by making a PR to vidify/vidify.org-source, which is better than wiki contributions. I still have to polish it a lot, but it’s ready to be public already.
